jobInfo.postDescription:
【岗位职责】
1. Complete EMC testing of automotive electronic parts products according to the project plan.
根据项目计划协助EMC测试工程师完成汽车电子零部件产品的EMC测试工作；
2. Ensure that the test process, records, data and results meet the standard requirements and project quality requirements.
确保测试过程、记录、数据、结果符合标准要求和项目质量要求；
3. Have high work efficiency and complete the established test tasks within the planned time.
有较高的工作效率，在计划时间内完成既定测试任务；
4. Be responsible for the daily maintenance of instruments and equipment.
负责仪器设备的日常维护工作。

【岗位要求】
1. College degree or above. Electronic and electrical, automation, electromechanical integration, communication or automotive engineering and other related majors.
大专或以上学历。 电子电气、自动化、机电一体化、通讯或汽车工程等工科相关专业均可；
2. Have certain basic knowledge of electronic circuits, strong hands-on ability, and be able to complete work tasks independently.
具有一定的电子电路基础知识，动手能力强，能够独立完成工作任务；
3. Have a high team spirit and strong ability to work under pressure.
有较高团队协作精神，具有较强的工作抗压能力；
4. Strong communication and learning skills, and certain English reading and writing skills.
具有较强的沟通和学习能力，具备一定的英语读、写能力；
5. Priority will be given to those with more than six months of work experience in the laboratory.
在电磁兼容测试相关领域具有半年以上工作经验者优先考虑。
6. Priority will be given to those with more than six months of work experience in the laboratory.
在实验室有半年以上工作经验者优先考虑；

【我们将为聘用者提供广阔的职业前景与优厚的福利待遇】：
1. Five-day eight-hour working system with weekends.
五天8小时工作制，周末双休；
2. The company provides social insurance (endowment insurance, medical insurance, maternity insurance, work-related injury insurance and unemployment insurance), medical insurance for major diseases of employees and group accident insurance for commercial insurance for each employee.
公司为每位员工办理社会保险（养老、医疗、生育、工伤、失业）以及职工重大疾病医疗险、商业保险团体意外险；
3. Holiday welfare: employees are given holiday gifts on Mid-Autumn Festival, Women's Day, Dragon Boat Festival and other festivals every year.
节假日福利：每年中秋节、妇女节、端午节等节日为员工发放节日礼品；
4. Paid leave: enjoy paid annual leave, statutory holidays, maternity leave (maternity leave, pregnancy examination leave, paternity leave, breastfeeding leave), marriage leave, sick leave, funeral leave and other holidays.
带薪假期：享有带薪年休假、法定节假日、孕产假（产假、孕检假、陪产假、哺乳假）、婚假、病假、丧假等假期；
5. Rich staff activities (tourism, staff dinners, staff exchange activities, afternoon tea, birthday party, etc.).
丰富的员工活动（旅游、员工聚餐、员工交流活动、下午茶、生日会等）；
6. According to the evaluation of employees' personal working ability, they can get 1-2 promotion opportunities for promotion and salary adjustment in a year. Enjoy a year-end double salary。
根据员工个人工作能力的评定，1年可获得1~2次晋级调薪的晋升机会。享有年底双薪；
7. Professional paid training, good promotion and development.
专业的带薪培训、良好的晋升发展；

Welcome young talents with entrepreneurial spirit to join our team!
欢迎有创业精神的青年才俊加盟我们的队伍！
Working address: Blue City Workshop, Qixi Industrial Park, No. 63, Punan Road, Huangpu District, Guangzhou.
工作地址：广州市黄埔区埔南路63号七喜工业园蔚蓝城市工场二楼206A
jobInfo.address: 广州黄埔区广州顺泰质量技术服务有限公司206

brandComInfo.introduce:
广州顺泰质量技术服务有限公司( 简称“SQT") 是一家专注于汽车及其零部件检测、国际认证的技术服务机构。

SQT检测能力覆盖电子后视镜/高级驾驶辅助/驾驶员监控系统的成像光学、车灯光学、EMC& 电性能、环境可靠性。实验室通过了CNAS、CMA、美国A2LA、国内多个主机厂的资质认可，为安全驾驶传递信赖。

SQT 认证服务拥有资深的专家团队，获得欧盟发证机构授权和直接合作，帮助整车及其部件制造商高效完成Emark/DOT/CE/SASO/ADR等国际认证，助力中国汽车制造顺利进入全球市场。
